system.description:
Your vision shifts into a sickly yellow tint. Your muscles tense up and contract inside you, made twitchy as new sensory information floods your brain.

You gain the following benefits and powers while wearing the goblin mask:

  • Darkvision. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

  • Goblin Tongue. You can speak, read, and write Goblin as a language.

  • Nimble Escape. While wearing it, you can use an action to expend 1 of its charges to take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action during your turn.

This mask has 5 charges. The mask regains 1d4 + 1 charges daily at sunrise.

If you expend the maskâ€™s last charge, roll a d20. On a 1, the mask shrivels away and is destroyed.
